ru.yandex.subtitles.ui.fragment

Class AbstractFragment<C>

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v4.app.Fragment
      • ru.yandex.subtitles.ui.fragment.AbstractFragment<C>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.support.v7.widget.Toolbar.OnMenuItemClickListener, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, OnBackKeyEventListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AboutAppFragment, AboutSpeechKitFragment, ConversationFragment, ConversationsFragment, FeedbackFragment, NavigationMenuFragment, PhrasesFragment, QuestionFragment, SettingsFragment, ZoomedMessageFragment, ZoomedMessagesFragment

    public abstract class AbstractFragment<C>
extends android.support.v4.app.Fragment
implements OnBackKeyEventListener, android.support.v7.widget.Toolbar.OnMenuItemClickListener
    Base fragment class that provides ability to work with in-fragment toolbar or activity's action bar. It also holds link to the fragment listener mController that automatically sets up in onAttach(Context) and clears on onDetach(). AbstractFragment handles onBackPressed() and onActivityResult(int, int, Intent) events and forwards them to the nested fragments.
